location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Discusses intelligence received from Muscat concerning the sighting of French ships and other developments. Confirms that Cochin remains in pocession of the Dutch. An additional note reports the arrival (and departure) of the Revenge(commanded by Captain Bryce Hardie) and the Lapwing Cutter(commanded by Captain Lieutenant Hardy).
